manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Fall in love with our award winning WubbaNub Pacifier, the original part plush, part pacifier. The patented WubbaNub design is sure to be your baby’s first friend. The unique style of the original WubbaNub Pacifier allows it to remain near baby’s mouth, easy to grasp, nearly impossible to lose and may assist baby to self soothe. WubbaNub is distributed in hospitals, NICU and well-baby units nationwide and is made with a 100% silicone pacifier, a non-latex and BPA, PVC and Phthalate-free. The durable one-piece construction of the pacifier means no germs hiding between cracks. WubbaNub is a safety-first company that mandates all infant/baby products are completely safety tested. NOTE: WubbaNub Pacifiers purchased online are packaged in a clear polybag with header card that further describes features and benefits.

PJ BEAR PJ Baby Bear is a little homebody that is perfectly happy cozying up to baby any time of the day. The unique style of the WubbaNub pacifier allows it to remain close and easily positioned by the baby. Measures approximately 5 x 5 x 2 inches. POLAR BEAR After a plunge in the icy water, this new limited-edition baby Polar Bear is ready for some serious snuggling. Finished with plaid-print paws and ears, the playful winter-white companion was created especially for the holiday season. His plush little legs are super-easy for tiny hands grab hold of, while the unique style of the WubbaNub pacifier always allows it to remain close and be easily positioned by your baby. Meaures approximately 6 x 5 x 2 inches. PINK BEAR Pretty in pink and a best friend for life, WubbaNub Pink Bear will instantly brighten up the day of everyone in the family. Its dainty legs are the perfect size for little hands to hold onto. The unique style of the WubbaNub pacifier allows it to remain close and easily position to baby. Measures approximately 7 x 5 x 2 inches. BLUE BEAR With his natural habitat being the great outdoors, it’s no wonder that WubbaNub Blue Bear loves to chase fireflies, play tag, and enjoy long winter days. His little legs are the perfect size for baby to hold onto. The unique style of the WubbaNub pacifier allows it to remain close and easily position to baby. Measures approximately 6 x 5 x 2 inches.

WubbaNub Brand - The Original Pacifier/Plush Animal combinationDurable one piece construction is both functional and stylish. Patented design makes it easy for baby to grasp.Distributed in hospitals, NICU and well-baby units nationwide.Made with 100% silicone pacifier. Latex free, BPA, PVC and Phthalate free.Recommended for newborns through six months. (Not suggested for babies with teeth or in teething stage)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality pacifier especially for infants
reviews.reviewText: These have been the best pacifiers for my kids. They can grab them and pull them to their mouths by themselves at just a couple months old which is super helpful for us. Thr bear is super cute too! It's a little inconvenient to completely clean...most of the time we just wash and rinse the pacifier part. But it's easy enough to throw in the washer or wash with soap and dry longer. Just have to have a large enough stash of pacifiers!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Favorite Gift for Baby Showers!
reviews.reviewText: Favorite gift for baby showers! Works great as baby shower decor on top of drink dispensers, diaper cakes, as a gift topper and more!The quality is amazing and new parents often want to purchase more in case they lose the one they received :) There are so many cute options for WubbaNubs so search google to find your favorite animal before purchasing because WubbaNub probably makes it! So great for themed baby showers too!Looks so cute in baby pictures and way easier to travel with than a large security blanket.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2019
reviews.reviewText: I love this so much better than the pacifier by it self. It's so much easier to keep in his mouth while self soothing to fall asleep. It's so soft and easy to clean. I just pop it in the washer with his laundry and air dry .. although it has accidentally gone in the dryer before.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So stinking cute
reviews.reviewText: I love these type of pacifiers they are so cute and the lady i gifted it to loved it as well. The baby loves it too

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 19, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for babies who like soothie pacifiers
reviews.reviewText: My oldest didn't like pacifiers. Her baby brother loves his soothie pacifiers. This makes it so much easier to find when it falls out especially in the car seat!Update: My son has had 4 of these- he’s almost 2 years old. He loved his original so much we needed back-ups! His original bought when he was born is still going strong! Only one ended up breaking and that’s because he bit it when about 19mths.We have been extremely satisfied with these. Wash well in the machine. Hold up great. And my sons go to for soothing himself.He’s starting to give up his pacis now but these pacis have made naptime, and bedtime so much easier for almost two years! Great purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best. Binky. Ever.
reviews.reviewText: Someone gifted this to me and man, best thing ever. The toy attached helps the binky stay in a newborn mouth. My little always would accidentally spit it out but the toy helped it stay where she could reach it and keep it in her mouth. Now that she's a bit older, she calls it her B and snuggles it more now like a bed time toy. Best. Ever.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 18, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BEST brand of pacifiers
reviews.reviewText: I got it for my son when he was 1 month old after discovering he had a big sucking reflex. Over the time he's been using these pacifiers, he has learned to grab them and put them in his mouth, an ability I believe he wouldn't have gained nearly as quickly or as adeptly had he been using regular pacifiers without the attached plushy.I love that I can throw these in the washer, and they come out beautiful.I own 3 of them now, and my son ABSOLUTELY loves these pacifiers. He's 6 months old and he still uses them and they're all in perfect condition even after LOTS of use and washes.They're also THE CUTEST pacifiers out there.GET THEM!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My son loves his 'Teddy' (as he has been named)
reviews.reviewText: The pacifier is his security. We have had to buy a few backup "Teddy's" already. I would highly recommend this procuct.
注文した時期がクリスマス直前と輸送関連が非常に込み合う時期も重なって、到着予定日16日後を過ぎましたが、発送元が誠実な対応してくれたため問題なしです。
